text: Jefferson is a town in Ashe County, North Carolina, United States. In 2020, 1,622 people lived there. It is the county seat of Ashe County. ==Geography== Jefferson is at . The United States Census Bureau says that the town has a total area of . Of that, , or 0.20%, is water. The New River, which is part of the Ohio River. It is one of the oldest in the eastern United States, and it goes through the town. ==People== ==References== Category:Towns in North Carolina Category:County seats in North Carolina
title: Jefferson, North Carolina
